description: Summer entertaining just got easier with this pork ribs recipe. The ribs are coated in a sticky barbecue sauce and served with a fresh citrus salad.
name: Sticky Pork Ribs With Charred Lettuce & Orange Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.3kg Woolworths COOK slow cooked pork ribs in a smokey BBQ sauce
2 baby cos lettuce, trimmed, quartered lengthways
2 oranges, peeled, thinly sliced into rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Cook ribs according to packet instructions.

Meanwhile, spray a chargrill pan with oil and heat over high heat. Grill lettuce, cutsides down, for 2 minutes on each side or until golden. Transfer to a large bowl. Add orange, onion, oil and vinegar, then toss to combine. Season.
Cut ribs into portions and serve with salad.
